attributes.action: Independence for the Isle of Man
attributes.additional_details: The small nation is not part of the UK, nor the EU, but doesn't have the powers to control immigration. The term 'Crown Dependency' is an old imperialist term that shouldn't be cast upon the Islands respectable 80,000 inhabitants. We must revoke the status of Man as a British self-governing Crown dependency and establish a completely sovereign state, which would be a republic. The Isle of Man has self governed for over a thousand years, and has the oldest parliament in the world. Liberate its people from a British Blight!
